snippet.title: iOS Swift: How to integrate the Facebook Login SDK and getting user's email address
snippet.description:
iOS Basic Training Course:
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/basic-training

Important Swift 3 Update
The information in this video is out of date, please follow this guide here for the latest on how to get Facebook integration working:
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/playlist/Firebase-Social-Login/video/Facebook-Authentication-and-Cocoapods

Following all of the steps to setup your Facebook application, you'll then drag and drop the framework files into your project.  Having done that, we create a bridging header file to allow us access to the Objective-C library in Swift.

Finally, we create our login button and perform an FBSDKGraphRequest to get hold of the logged in user's email address.
